Description.Text: Aria Hotel Apartments Melbourne is a modern 4-star superior property offering relaxed accommodation near the heart of Melbourne. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location close to several bars and restaurants and the Royal Botanic Gardens. Melbourne is often referred to as the cultural capital of Australia. It is home to a wealth of museums, theatres, art galleries and green spaces, which all contribute to its reputation as 'the world's most liveable city'. Places of interest include the iconic Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG), the beautiful Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne and the Eureka Skydeck 88, which boasts spectacular panoramic views of the city. The hotel is housed in a modern high-rise building. Facilities include a chargeable gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. 1-Bedroom Apartments are spacious, open and decorated in a bright, modern style with pastel tones and carpeted floors. They feature a kitchenette, a living room and a balcony. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Every apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
